name: SecureSheet
overview:
SecureSheet is a web-based data management system that offers businesses the comfortable familiarity of an Excel spreadsheet, but without the limitations associated with spreadsheets.

Appreciated for its stability and flexibility, SecureSheet has successfully overcome the objections sometimes raised by business spreadsheet users: lack of audit trails; delays in receiving critical data; capacity limitations; data siloing, and many more. And the process is simpleâ€”upload an Excel spreadsheet, customize it, and securely share it with uniquely permissioned users.

SecureSheetâ€™s capabilities run from complex web database functionality to a simple business spreadsheet. Organizations can collect data from thousands of users simultaneouslyâ€”and in real time; track and manage finances; plan retail operations; and streamline their Sarbanes-Oxley compliance process.

Leveraging existing technologies and focusing on easy adoption for users, SecureSheet has created a simple way for businesses to communicate more effectively. The ordinary business spreadsheet has been transformed into a secure, multi-user, web-based, business application. To learn more, please visit www.securesheet.com
